issue.title: [Python] Clarify pyarrow.serialize/deserialize docstrings viz-a-viz relationship with Arrow IPC protocol
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6336](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6336). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Some users have been confused that these functions are equivalent in some way to IPC streams. We should add language explaining in more detail what they do and when to use them

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6336?focusedCommentId=16933860) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 5427
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/5427>
